az: please wake me when im free i cannot bear captivity where my culture im told holds no significance ill wither and die in ignorance but my inner eye can c a race who reigned as kings in another place the green of trees were rich and full and every man spoke of beautiful men and women together as equals war was gone because all was peaceful but now like a nightmare i wake 2 c that i live like a prisoner of poverty please wake me when im free i cannot bear captivity 4 i would rather be stricken blind than 2 live without expression of mind
